8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Yazid Ar-Rishk said:"I heard Mu'adhah saying to Aishah: 'Did the Messenger of Allah fast three days of every month?' She replied in the affirmative. So she said: 'Which of them would he fast?' She said: 'Which of them he would fast was not noticeable

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَوْمِ ثَلاَثَةِ أَيَّامٍ مِنْ كُلِّ شَهْرٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting Three (Days) Of Every Month
